Data Structures | Functions
ID Utility Functions
utils

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides device identification utilities for Ambiq Micro devices. It enables chip ID reading, version identification, and feature detection for system configuration and compatibility checking. The utilities support detailed device information retrieval and verification.

Key Features

  1. Chip ID: Device identification capabilities.
  2. Version Check: Silicon revision detection.
  3. Feature Detection: Available feature identification.
  4. Compatibility: System compatibility checking.
  5. Security Info: Device security status retrieval.

Functionality

  • Read device identification
  • Check silicon revisions
  • Detect available features
  • Verify system compatibility
  • Access security information

Usage

  1. Get device ID with am_util_id_device()
  2. Check silicon revision
  3. Verify feature availability
  4. Validate compatibility

Configuration

  • Define ID check parameters
  • Configure feature detection
  • Set compatibility requirements
  • Enable security checks

struct  am_util_id_t

Macros for MCUCTRL CHIP INFO field.

Note
these macros are derived from CHIPPN definitions.
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO330P_510L   0x11000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO510   0x10000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO4L   0x09000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO4   0x08000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO3P   0x07000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO3   0x06000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLOBL   0x05000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_VOYAGER   0x04000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO2   0x03000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLOHC   0x02000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_APOLLO   0x01000000
 
#define AM_UTIL_MCUCTRL_CHIP_INFO_PARTNUM_PN_M   0xFF000000
 

Macros for silicon identification

Function Documentation

◆ am_util_id_device()

uint32_t am_util_id_device ( am_util_id_t * psIDDevice)

Device identification.

Parameters
psIDDevice- ptr to a device ID structure (am_util_id_t*) to be filled in by the function.

This function provides additional information about the currently running Ambiq Micro MCU device.

Returns
The ui32Device value, which is a value corresponding to the device type.
